pci:markup.html5:script: <html5:ol class="plain block-listing solid choice-area"> {{#each choices}} <html5:li class="qti-choice qti-simpleChoice"> <html5:div class="pseudo-label-box js-label-box"> <html5:label class="real-label"> {{#ifCond ../choiceType "==" "checkbox"}} <html5:input class="js-answer-input" type="checkbox" name="{{../../serial}}_choice" value="{{inc @index}}" {{#ifCond ../../state "==" "question"}} disabled="disabled" {{/ifCond}}> <html5:span class="icon-checkbox"></html5:span> {{/ifCond}} {{#ifCond ../choiceType "==" "radio"}} <html5:input class="js-answer-input" type="radio" name="{{../../serial}}_choice" value="{{inc @index}}" {{#ifCond ../../state "==" "question"}} disabled="disabled" {{/ifCond}}> <html5:span class="icon-radio"></html5:span> {{/ifCond}} </html5:label> <html5:div class="label-box"> <html5:div class="label-content clear js-choice-label" data-choice-index="{{@index}}"> <html5:div>{{this}}</html5:div> </html5:div> </html5:div> </html5:div> <div class="mini-tlb" data-edit="question" data-for="" style="display: none;"> <html5:div class="rgt tlb-button js-remove-choice" data-choice-index="{{@index}}" title="Delete"> <html5:span class="icon-bin"></html5:span> </html5:div> </html5:div> </html5:li> {{/each}} {{#ifCond state "==" "question"}} <html5:li class="add-option js-add-choice"> <html5:span class="icon-add"></html5:span> Add choice </html5:li> {{/ifCond}} </html5:ol>
